result:
Admission

Admission into JS 1, 2 and SS 1 & 2 is through an entrance examination and oral interview.

Admission into JS 1, 2 and SS 1 & 2 is through an entrance examination and oral interview. The examination normally comes up between June and August every year. Students are tested on English Language, Mathematics, Verbal Aptitude, Quantitative Reasoning and General Knowledge.

Upon meeting the requirements after the entrance examination, students are admitted and placed as appropriate into various classes. It should be in sub-conscious minds of the prospective students to be battle ready as such admission is done through competitive written and oral examinations. However, application forms can be obtained from the school and other designated centres across the state.

Application Procedure:

i. Obtain forms at the College or at the designated centres below: ii. Complete the forms and submit them to the point of purchase before the date of the examination iii. Candidates for admission into JSS 1 should report with their identity slips for the Admission Examination at the College on a date between June & August every year to be announced later by the school iv. While candidates for other classes should report with their identity slip for the examination at the College on a Separate date between June & August every year to be announced later by the school

Designated Centres for sale of Form:

Goke Babalola 2, OkeEjigbo Road, Ijayeoja-Ale, Abeokuta. Tell: 08033468162

Saratab Ventures, Opposite Frontier Hotel, Border Road, Idiroko, Tell: 08024209070
